title: Myntra sale
description: Magzter is a cross-platform, self-service, global digital magazine newsstand with over 8,000 magazines from 3,400+ publishers.Magzter was founded in 2011. The Company headquartered in NEW YORK. Magzter GOLD is an all-you-can-read model where users will get unlimited access to 5,000+ Magazines and Premium Articles for just Rs.3999 for a 3 year subscription (Original Price Rs.11,997)

title: Deal Of the Day
